column2: Big Boy's October Extravaganza 2: Electric Boogaloo
column5:
We're back! This year will be a random clusterfuck of things that I've wanted to see for a long time, and maybe some new stuff that I have no clue about.

I'll review a few of these. You're fucking crazy if you think I'll review them all. There's only so many times you can use "it was scary!!!11111" before it gets boring.

For many of these films I will be joined by my friend Angus, as well as others, hopefully.

One more thing. If I don't make it through these films, I have to sit through "Kickassia" and "To Boldly Flee" on the weekend following October. God help me if that's the case.

Enjoy..?
